description: This file defines the HomeFragment class, which is a UI component for the home screen of an Android TV application. It manages display of category rows with videos, including a 'Continue Watching' row, handles navigation via DPAD, and communicates with host activity for actions like opening details or resuming video playback.

classes.name: HomeFragment
classes.description: A Fragment managing the home screen, displaying video categories with focus navigation and interactions.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout from XML.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Refreshes the UI when returning to the fragment.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes views, data, focus, and key event handling.

methods.name: refreshRows
methods.description: Refreshes data for category rows, including 'Continue Watching', sets up focus management, and initializes the adapter.

methods.name: getVideosForRow
methods.description: Retrieves list of videos for a given row index.

methods.name: getSelectedVideo
methods.description: Returns the video at specified row and column indices.

methods.name: isContinueWatchingRow
methods.description: Checks if a given row index pertains to the 'Continue Watching' row.
